snippet.title: Leximan | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now: https://bit.ly/Leximan
Do you like silly hats? Were you that one kid in class who broke reality? Are you eating nutritional slime right now? Embark on a brilliant adventure, using words and incompetence to solve bizarre problems. There are also hat goblins.

Official site: https://marvelousgames.com/games/leximan
Twitter: http://twitter.com/borria
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/marvelouseurope
Instagram: http://instagram.com/marvelouseurope
